title: cmd/gc: internal compiler error: unknown etype 0/STRUCT
body:
1. What is a short input program that triggers the error?
http://play.golang.org/p/_gFBJrdKso

2. What is the full compiler output?
prog.go:24: internal compiler error: unknown etype 0/STRUCT

3. What version of the compiler are you using?  (Run it with the -V flag.)
see below for go version?

---------------------------

here's some more info:

What does 'go version' print? go version devel +2f6b9f80be36 Fri Apr 25 09:46:07 2014
-0600 linux/amd64

What steps reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.

1. this program should compile without error http://play.golang.org/p/_gFBJrdKso --- but
results in "prog.go:24: internal compiler error: unknown etype 0/STRUCT".

2. adding "t " to line 14 fixes it --- http://play.golang.org/p/AcWJefCBCG

3. the presence or absence of the "t " should not affect compilation or
running of the program.
